plot: In his attempt to salvage his relationship with his girlfriend Susie, James soon finds himself stuck in his own version of an 'Korean Drama', filled with love triangles,deception, secrets, and ridiculous plot twists.
title: My Own Korean Drama
plot_es: In his attempt to salvage his relationship with his girlfriend Susie, James soon finds himself stuck in his own version of an 'Korean Drama', filled with love triangles,deception, secrets, and ridiculous plot twists.
